function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of control over the types of groups occupying different amenities","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission due to unmonitored occupancy of spaces by specific groups","Mitigation":"Implement strict control measures to restrict the occupancy of amenities based on the type of group visiting","Technologies":"Access control systems, surveillance cameras, occupancy tracking systems","People":"Visitors, occupants, individuals at amenities","Owner":"Building managers, security personnel, facility administrators"},{"Description":"Undefined level of vulnerability for different groups of people","Impact":"Difficulty in assessing and addressing the risk of contagious disease transmission for specific groups","Mitigation":"Develop a standardized vulnerability assessment framework and measurement criteria for different groups of people","Technologies":"Vulnerability assessment tools, data analytics, risk assessment software","People":"Vulnerable groups, public health authorities, facility administrators","Owner":"Public health authorities, facility administrators, risk management teams"},{"Description":"Lack of association between vulnerability levels and specific groups of people","Impact":"Inability to identify and address the specific vulnerability levels of different groups to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Establish clear associations between vulnerability levels and specific groups using role-based mechanisms and x-is-the-y-of-z function","Technologies":"Role-based access control systems, database management systems, knowledge representation frameworks","People":"Public health authorities, risk management teams, facility administrators","Owner":"Public health authorities, facility administrators, knowledge management teams"}]}
